attributes.action: Send arm forces in to France to stop illegals from trying to get in to England
attributes.background: We are a small country that is to soft and carnt afford for anymore refugees or illegals to enter this country. Our country is in det as ir is. Sort our finances out first n then help the rest.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105489

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
